title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Thursday 27 August 2015 - BBC News
summary: campaigners in egypt say they 're starting legal action against the sale of the statue sekhemka .
northampton saints have had three players named in england 's rugby world cup squad .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on friday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for northamptonshire are , alas , no more for today , but do not fear , we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with all the latest news , weather , sport and travel .

documents.title: england head coach praises saints players who missed out
text: stuart lancaster , the england rugby head coach , has been speaking about the 31 man squad for the world cup which was announced earlier today .

in this video from england rugby he says saints prop alex corbisiero , who did n't make the squad , has 'shown quality , ' while luther burrell , who lost out to sam burgess , was called 'outstanding ' .
you can watch the full video below

documents.title: weather : dry overnight , sunny spells tomorrow
text: showers this evening will gradually fade away to leave most areas dry overnight with long clear spells , and just a little patchy cloud .
temperatures dipping to 10c ( 50f ) .
friday will be mainly dry with lengthy sunny spells , but increasing patchy cloud may bring a few afternoon showers .
temperatures reaching up to 20c ( 68f ) .
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: which other saints players will be joining the england trio ?
text: three northampton saints players , keiran brookes , courtney lawes , and tom wood , have been announced in the england world cup squad , and they 'll definitely be joined at the tournament by another saints trio .
ken pisi , george pisi and kahn fotualii ( all be included in the samoa squad for the world cup , which starts next month .
also , barring injury , the saints and wales winger george north will be there .
he is set make is return from concussion on saturday against ireland .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: university of northampton student highlights pets ' positive effect on autistic children
text: research by university of northampton student , katy bolus , has found evidence that pets can have a positive effect on the behaviour of young people with autism spectrum disorder after interviewing parents about their children 's relationship with their pets .
parents reported many positive changes in behaviour when their children interacted with their pets .
these included an increased calmness , increased social interaction and communication and decreases in negative behaviours , such as meltdowns . ''
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: saints prop says he 's 'unbelievably honoured ' by world cup selection
text: kieran brookes , who is joining northampton saints after the world cup , has reacted to his selection in stuart lancaster the 31-man england squad for the tournament .
over the moon and unbelievably honoured to be selected in the wc squad !

documents.title: abington park museum to host first ever 'collectors ' day '
text: northamptonshire collectors are being invited to enter their collections for a 'collectors ' day ' exhibition at abington park museum on saturday , 24 october .

organisers from northampton museum & art gallery are hoping the exhibition will feature a wide range of collections , from toys to costumes , fossils , music memorabilia and ceramics.the closing date for applications is monday , 12 october .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: early evening headlines : three saints players make world cup squad rise in number of businesses in the county
text: if you 're catching up , here are the top stories
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: who is england and saint prop kieran brookes ?
text: one of the northampton saints players announced in stuart lancaster 's england world cup squad is forward kieran brookes , but saints fans have yet to see him in action as he joins the club after the tournament , having agreed a three-year deal in january .
he has already won 11 caps for england and previously played for newcastle and leicester and cites former northampton saints hooker steve thompson as player he admires .
do n't forget - you can get the latest rugby union alerts on the bbc sports app .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: misspelled sign spotted in northampton
text: if you 've spotted any others around the county , tweet them to us @ twitterid
remember the misspelled aylesbury sign in mk ?
this one for abington park has been spotted in northampton : # heartnews

documents.title: no donations for campaign to buy sekhemka say egyptian media
text: egyptian state media agency mena is reporting there have been no donations to a campaign to raise money to buy back the 4000-year-old sekhemka statue sold by northampton borough council last year .

the uk government has had an export ban in place to try and allow a uk buyer to be found , which runs out at midday tomorrow , but will only be extended again if someone shows a serious intent to raise the funds to keep it in the uk .
this looks increasingly unlikely .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton chronicle & echo : illegal traveller camp evicted from site of former middle school
text: travellers who set up an illegal camp on land at a former middle school in northampton have been evicted following a court order .

documents.title: police renew appeal for potential victims in jesus fellowship abuse investigation
text: northamptonshire police has renewed its appeal for potential victims to come forward in its investigation into alleged historic sexual and physical abuse at the jesus fellowship .

last week the force announced it had arrested a number of people following a series of historical complaints of physical and sexual abuse from various individuals , many of whom were referred directly to the police by the current leadership of the jesus fellowship ( formerly jesus army ) .
all of the complaints being investigated by detectives refer to alleged incidents dating from the late 1970s through to the late 1990s , police said .
we 're waiting to hear back from the force as to the number of complaints involved .

documents.title: steelbacks could still have 'boom boom ' back for t20 finals day
text: # northamptonshire still hopeful of having shahid afridi at # t20blast finals day .
crook & white improving & could be fit # countycricket
@ twitterid find that hard to believe when he 's been visiting hospitals in pakistan all week !
@ twitterid there were logistical problems to try and overcome
@ twitterid crooky were jogging today .
fitness test tomorrow 10 am

documents.title: afternoon weather : showers possible but sunny spells
text: there are likely to be a few showers around this afternoon , but there will also be some good sunny spells and some places will miss the showers altogether .
there will be a noticeable south-westerly breeze , especially during the afternoon around daventry .
maximum temperature of 19c ( 66f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: daventry express : warning over toxic water at daventry country park
text: a woman is warning visitors to daventry country park of the danger posed by a toxic algae after her pet was fatally poisoned after swimming in the reservoir .

documents.title: latest headlines : no donation to campaign to buy sekhemka burrell misses out on world cup squad
text: here 's what we are looking at into the afternoon :
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton saints centre burrell 'jettisoned ' for sam burgess
text: sam burgess 's inclusion was always expected given the investment the england management has put in him since his switch from rugby league - but it is still a highly controversial call .

despite all his obvious credentials , burgess is still raw as a union player , let alone a centre - with only 70 minutes of international experience under his belt - while the jettisoned luther burrell has been a regular presence over the past few seasons .
author: Chris Jones
BBC 5 live rugby reporter

documents.title: burrell misses out because burgess makes a 'bigger impact '
text: i think northampton saints centre luther burrell is unlucky to miss out on the england world cup squad , especially as he played really well against france in paris ,
but it 's about who can make the bigger impact off the bench and i understand why the england coaches think it would be sam burgess .
author: Ian Hunter
Former England and Northampton Saints winger

documents.title: rugby world cup : disappointment for luther burrell who misses out on squad
text: as expected luther burrell has been left out by head coach lancaster , despite playing every game in the last two six nations tournament .
his place goes to bath 's rugby league convert sam burgess - it 'll be a crushing disappointment to the young centre .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: breakingburrell misses out on world cup squad but three saints players in
text: northampton saints centre luther burrell has not been selected in stuart lancaster 's england rugby world cup squad .
saints playerss tom wood , courtney lawes and new signing kieran brookes all make the squad .
callum clark and alex corbisiero also miss out .

documents.title: mp david mackintosh : sekhemka 'not a matter for me '
text: the man who spearheaded the sale of egyptian statue sekhemka by northampton borough council has refused to comment on increased international condemnation of the move .

on the day the cairo branch of the 'save sekhemka action group ' said it is considering legal action over the sale of the 4,000 year old statue , a spokesman for northampton south mp david mackintosh said the issue was a matter for the borough council .
mr mackintosh had been leader of the council when the sale went through , saying the money raised was needed to expand northampton 's museum .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fourth comedy award nomination for kettering comedian james acaster
text: kettering comic james acaster , 30 , has been nominated for best show at the edinburgh fringe festival for the fourth year in a row , having lost out with his previous three nominations .
acaster is up against seven other shows , the longest shortlist ever for the award , with the winner being announced at 12.30 on saturday .
29 august .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northamptonshire telegraph : cadets spend summer tackling anti-social parking
text: police cadets have spent the summer tackling motorists who park inconsiderately and in an anti-social manner in wellingborough .

documents.title: wellingborough mp says migration figures 'unacceptable '
text: new figures show 330,000 more people entered the country in the year to march than left it .
the official statistics show 8.3m people living here were born abroad , an eighth of the uk population which , the conservative mp for wellingborough peter bone has describe as 'unacceptable ' .
immigration is the number one issue in the country and certainly in my area by a long way , and what we have to do is deal with the issue and the figures today are unacceptable . ''
author: BBC News England

documents.title: day of champions ahead of motogp weekend
text: today is the 'day of champions ' at silverstone ahead of the motogp this weekend .
the event is to raise money for the pitsford-based charity riders for health .

documents.title: latest headlines : mp brands migration figures 'unacceptable ' saints players await england squad announcement
text: here are the stories we 're looking at into the afternoon :
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: george north in wales team to face ireland , his first game since march
text: northampton saints and wales wing george north will make his comeback from concussion against ireland in dublin on saturday .
north , who has not played since march , is named in a near full-strength side for wales ' second world cup warm-up game against the irish .
alun wyn jones captains wales against ireland on saturday , with sam warburton not included in the 23 .

documents.title: today 's big throwback thursday
text: the main image on our page today is from the corby archiving facebook page and is a of the manor house in rothwell .
every thursday we 'll feature a of northamptonshire past , so if you have any old or photographs then email them to us , or you can tweet us .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: is george north the new jonah lomu ?
text: the welsh team to play ireland is announced today at 12:00 and new zealand legend jonah lomu played down comparisons between himself and wales and northampton saints winger george north .
i think george is just george .
he has his own unique style of playing and i 've got nothing but admiration for the man .
he 's got the weight of the nation on his shoulder and they ca n't wait for him to get out on the paddock . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: fresh appeal for information over miller 's meadow sexual assault
text: police investigating a serious sexual assault on a woman in northampton have issued a fresh appeal for information .
it happened in miller 's meadow off st andrew 's road in the semilong area last thursday morning .
police say they believe it was `` an isolated incident '' .
they 're looking for a white man about six-foot with a slim build .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northampton borough council say sekhemka is not their issue anymore
text: the 'save sekhemka action group ' in cairo says it is starting legal action in egypt to challenge the sale of the 4000-year-old statue by northampton borough council last year .
however , the council has responded by saying : `` this is a matter for the current owner of the statue and the government . ''
we contacted the uk department for culture , media and sport , and the egyptian ministry for antiquities about this .
neither got back to us .
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northants herald & post : curry house pushes for top restaurant prize
text: a restaurant in northampton has been named as a regional finalist in the coveted tiffin cup - a parliamentary search for the country 's top curry house .

documents.title: northamptonshire 'a great place to start a business '
text: northamptonshire enterprise partnership say there are plenty of reason why the number of new business in the county has increased .
official figures show a rise from 2,720 in 2009 to around 4,200 five years later .
northamptonshire is very well positioned in the uk , it 's a great place to start a business .
also there are lots of entrepreneurial people working with larger businesses who being encouraged to do their own thing . ''
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northamptonshire youngsters aiming for golfing glory
text: golfers from northamptonshire and wiltshire are current on the course competing in the english boys ' county championship at king 's lynn golf club in norfolk .
northamptonshire defeated durham 5-4 in the semi-final with 17-year-old callum farr ( hitting a hole-in-one .
you can follow the scores on the england golf website .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: wellingborough rural safer community policing team back out today
text: morning all !
# backinthesaddle after a while off !
# wilby # visiblepolicing

documents.title: daventry express : new building for mental health charity
text: the new home for the daventry branch of mind officially opened on tuesday .

documents.title: legal action over sekhemka would 'struggle to succeed '
text: daniel mcclean , an art lawyer with the firm howard kennedy in london , has cast doubt on threatened legal action over ancient egyptian statue sekhemka from the 'save sekhemka action group ' in egypt .

northampton borough council sold the statue to a private buyer last year , but mr mcclean said any legal action would `` struggle to succeed '' unless it comes from the egyptian government , but even then there would be `` little chance of it working '' .
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: latest headlines : fresh appeal over sexual assault legal action started over sekhemka
text: here 's what we are looking at :
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: could hartley make the rugby world cup squad ?
text: former england head coach dick best says he 'd like to see dylan hartley brought back in the england rugby squad , despite the saints captain being banned for the first game of the tournament .
i expect [ hartley ] to be named in the squad .
it was clear at the weekend that we have n't got a hooker who can throw in , and for me he would be the starting hooker . ''
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: excitement building for northamptonshire 's t20 finals day
text: northamptonshire captain alex wakley says the nerves will start today ahead of saturday 's twenty20 finals day at edgbaston - an experience wakley has already tasted , having led his side to victory in the final two years ago .

a few people ca n't contain themselves , but we were very strict in 2013 , that it was do what you want , and do what you normally do , why change anything but when you cross that white line you switch on ''
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: northampton chronicle & echo : police sack drunk staff member
text: a member of northamptonshire police staff has been sacked after he attended his place of work when he was drunk , latest details of misconduct investigations have revealed .

documents.title: saints ' burrell looks set to miss out on world cup squad
text: sam burgess is expected to be included in england 's 31 man squad for the rugby world cup , which starts next month , meaning fellow centre and northampton saints star luther burrell could miss out .

rugby league convert burgess only made his union debut for bath in november and won his first england cap against france in august , while burrell was a regular during the past two six nations campaigns .
head coach stuart lancaster will name his squad at 13:45 .
author: Chris Jones
BBC 5 live rugby reporter

documents.title: more entrepreneurs in northamptonshire despite downturn
text: there 's been a big rise in the number of new business ventures here in northamptonshire .
official figures show an increase from 2,720 in 2009 to around 4,200 five years later .
that 's despite the economic downturn at the time .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: criticism for corby waste collection and environmental services
text: a corby borough council report has highlighted problems with food waste collections , fly-tipping , street cleansing services , grass cutting and the maintenance of shrubs and beds .
the service is provided for corby borough council by kier .
the council 's value for money review concludes that `` performance is falling short of contractual standards and obligations . ''
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: campaigners in egypt say they 'll take legal action over sekhemka sale
text: the save sekhemka action group in cairo says it is launching legal action against the sale of the 4000-year-old statue by northampton borough council , which made the authority nearly £ 8m when it was bought by a private buyer last year .
one option is to leave [ the sekhemka statue ] for humanity in a london museum .
if northampton museum does not want it and has put it up for sale like a box of cigarettes then maybe a london museum can take it . ''
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: latest headlines : sekhemka legal threat corby waste collection criticised
text: here are the top stories :
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northamptonshire weather : showers and sunny spells
text: a few showers will be seen during the day , but there will also be some good sunny spells and some places will miss the showers altogether .
there will be a noticeable southwesterly breeze , especially during the afternoon around daventry .
maximum temperature of 19c ( 66f ) .
you can see my full forecast on the bbc look east facebook page .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: good morning and welcome to bbc local live for northamptonshire
text: we 'll be here from now until 18:00 bringing you the latest news , weather , sport and travel .
there is more news on the sekhemka statue this morning and at 13:45 we 'll find out which northampton saints players will or wo n't be in the england rugby world cup squad .
if you want to get in touch then email me , tweet us , or head to facebook .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live
